levels.description: Deals <@ba.vup>{atk_scale:0%}</> ATK as Physical damage to the target and nearby enemies; after this skill has been used <@ba.vup>5 times</>: Chongyue's <@ba.vup>attack range increases</> and attacks <@ba.vup>hit twice</>; this skill becomes <@ba.vdown>auto-activated</> and <@ba.vup>deals damage an extra time</>.
